DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Plan Study Activity Display Order ISO21090.INT.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._Exhibit, present, or demonstrate for viewing.:A logical or comprehensible arrangement of separate elements._Number results from counting and enumerating.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Plan Study Activity Display Order
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._Exhibit, present, or demonstrate for viewing.:A logical or comprehensible arrangement of separate elements.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Plan Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
To devise, contrive, or form in design.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Exhibit, present, or demonstrate for viewing.:A logical or comprehensible arrangement of separate elements.

Concepts.definition: Exhibit, present, or demonstrate for viewing.
A logical or comprehensible arrangement of separate elements; a condition of regular or proper arrangement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 4/6/11 - no longer used by BRIDG; released for reuse by COPPA

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Number results from counting and enumerating.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/19/13 Added AIM Foundation Model CSI reference. jc
